memberdef.name: addCoin

memberdef.argsstring: (interfaces::Chain &chain, const CAmount &nTargetValue, OutputGroupTypeMap &groups, const CoinSelectionParams &coin_selection_params, bool allow_mixed_output_types)
memberdef.name: AttemptSelection

detaileddescription.para: Attempt to find a valid input set that preserves privacy by not mixing OutputTypes. ChooseSelectionResult() will be called on each OutputType individually and the best the solution (according to the waste metric) will be chosen. If a valid input cannot be found from any single OutputType, fallback to running ChooseSelectionResult() over all available coins.

parameterdescription.para: The chain interface to get information on bump fees for unconfirmed UTXOs
The grouped outputs mapped by coin eligibility filters

Relax restriction that SelectionResults must be of the same OutputType returns If successful, a SelectionResult containing the input set If failed, returns (1) an empty error message if the target was not reached (general "Insufficient funds") or (2) a specific error message if there was something particularly wrong (e.g. a selection result that surpassed the tx max weight size).
